description:
A powerful, intuitive, ultra-customizable and dead set on mailing

Mailbird is an innovative email client that revitalizes your emailing experience with a modern design and streamlined navigation. It integrates all your communication, collaboration, and productivity apps into one workspace, allowing you to manage your inbox efficiently. With features like sender blocking and inbox categories, it helps you focus on important messages and reduce clutter. Additionally, Mailbird offers a unique email template tool and leverages artificial intelligence to create natural-sounding emails quickly, enhancing your productivity and email management.
Enhancements
- Improved styling and performance.

Fixed Bugs
- Fixed issue where snoozed announcement keep showing up after restart due to different date time format.
